Html:
I'm able to get the station metadata through the headers in the response, but is it possible to read the metadata in the continuous stream with NAudio?

Mark submitted this link:
https://gist.github.com/markheath/3301840#file-mp3streamingpanelplugin-cs

Where someone supposedly inherit from ReadFullyStream to get the song name, but the code is not to be found.

Does anybody know how to do it, or has an example?.. what about you mark?
this was a code sample by Stephen Cole, which I posted in a Github gist as a simple way to share it. But I've never tried to use it myself.
So how do i get to see this? Where can i find Stephen Cole, or the code?
